bounties.title: Cellar Cleanup
bounties.description: The tavern cellar is overrun with giant rats! They're getting into the supplies. Please clear them out.

objectives.description: Clear 3 Giant Rats from the Cellar

bounties.title: Lost Locket
bounties.description: Mirabelle, a tavern regular, has lost her mother's precious silver locket. She believes she may have dropped it near the main tavern fireplace.

bounties.title: Urgent Delivery
bounties.description: I need this package delivered to Elara, the herbalist, by nightfall. She lives just outside the village, by the old willow tree. It's important, so no dawdling!

objectives.description: Deliver package to Elara the herbalist
